thread.title: Ex-divs to take around 34 points off FTSE 100 on Aug. 13
thread.title_full: Ex-divs to take around 34 points off FTSE 100 on Aug. 13

title: Ex-divs to take around 34 points off FTSE 100 on Aug. 13
text:
LONDON, Aug 10 (Reuters) - The following FTSE 100 companies will go 
ex-dividend on Thursday, after which investors will no longer qualify for the 
latest dividend payout. 
According to Reuters calculations at current market prices, the effect of 
the resulting adjustment to prices by market-makers would take around 34 points 
off the index. 
COMPANY (RIC) DIVIDEND STOCK OPTION MAX 
(pence) IMPACT 
ASTRAZENECA (NYSE: AZN - news ) 57.50 2.84 
BG 9.22 1.23 
DIAGEO (LSE: DGE.L - news ) 34.90 3.44 
DIRECT LINE (Other OTC: DIISY - news ) 4.60 0.25 
FRESNILLO (Amsterdam: FN6.AS - news ) $2.10 USc 0.01 
GKN (LSE: GKN.L - news ) 2.90 0.19 
GLAXOSMITHKLINE (Other OTC: GLAXF - news ) 19.00 3.62 
HSBC $10.00 USc YES 4.93 
LLOYDS 0.75 1.69 
PEARSON (Xetra: 858266 - news ) 18.00 0.57 
RECKITT BENCKISER (Xetra: A0M1W6 - news ) 50.30 1.25 
RIO TINTO (LSE: RIO.L - news ) 68.92 3.37 
ROYAL DUTCH SHELL A $42.30 USc YES 4.17 
ROYAL DUTCH SHELL B $47.00 USc YES 2.92 
SCHRODERS (LSE: SDR.L - news ) 29.00 0.13 
STANDARD CHARTERED (HKSE: 2888.HK - news ) $14.40 USc YES 0.76
